name: Age Restriction
description: Set age restrictions on selected content.

name: Automated Publishing
description: Allow users to schedule content posting.

name: Blog Importing
description: Import blog content from Blogger, Wordpress and Tumblr.

name: Blog Posts Management
description: Allow users to organise, manage and curate their blogs more efficiently.

name: Bulk Comment Management
description: Allow users to perform bulk operations on your comments.

name: Bulk Uploading
description: Allow users to perform bulk upload of files.

name: Community Forum
description: Allow users to engage in discussions on a forum.

name: Content Flag
description: Allow users to flag inappropriate content.

name: Content Moderation
description: Ensure all user posts are reviewed before making them public.

name: Data Export
description: Allow users to export data to CSV, XLS or PDF.

name: Document Preview
description: Allow users to preview, open and print documents from within your application.

name: Document Panel
description: Allow users to look up all of their documentation in one place.

name: Download
description: Enable download for your app content.

name: File Attachment
description: Allow users to attach files to posts.

name: Import Photoshop Document
description: A feature that lets users import Photoshop documents.

name: Landing Page
description: Create a web page specifically for the purposes of a marketing or advertising campaign.

name: Library
description: Allow users to list preferences in one place.

name: Manage Blog Comments
description: Allow users to manage blog comments by approving or deleting them.

name: Multipage Forms
description: A feature that breaks up long single page forms into multipage forms.

name: Paid Content
description: Allow users to pay for premium content.

name: PDF Conversion
description: A feature that converts files from PDF format into different formats.

name: Product Tour
description: Add an interactive tour which prompts users to explore certain points of interest across your application.

name: Rest API
description: Add custom REST API to provide developers with programmatic access to your application.

name: Search
description: Add search to your website to help visitors find content the content they want.

name: Spell Check
description: A feature to check the spelling of real-time text editing.

name: Testimonials
description: A feature to allow businesses to collect testimonials from customers and clients.

name: Travel Guide
description: A feature to help you plan your next journey.
